io.spine.server.transport

Class Subscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.transport.AbstractChannel
      • io.spine.server.transport.Subscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageChannel, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemorySubscriber

    @SPI
public abstract class Subscriber
extends AbstractChannel
    Subscriber for messages of a channel with the specified ID.

    There can be many subscribers per channel ID.

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessage> observer)
        Adds an observer, which will be receiving the subscription updates.

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessage> observer)
        Removes an existing observer and disconnects it from this subscription channel.

        In case the given observer is not registered at the moment, does nothing.

        Parameters:
        observer - an observer to remove

      • isStale

        public boolean isStale()
        Description copied from interface: MessageChannel
        Allows to understand whether this channel is stale and can be closed.
        Returns:
        true if the channel is stale, false otherwise
